comments:
Build ID: I20070517-1700

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a file in a PHP project named "foo.po"
2. Right click -> Open with-> Other ... -> PHP Editor
3. Error dialog results, NullPointerException is thrown.

Same error if ..
1. Windows-> Preferences-> General -> Editors -> File Associations
2. Add a File Association -> *.po
3. Associate PHP Editor with *.po type
4. Open file in Explorer View
5. Error dialog results

More information:

Dialog Text -

Problem Occurred:
Error opening the editor. (Time of error: ....)
Reason
java.lang.NullPointerException
can't reproduce, maybe problem with user preferences

Reopen this bug 
i got the same bug
